com.blade.security.web.cors

类 CorsMiddleware

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blade.security.web.cors.CorsMiddleware
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RouteHandler

    public class CorsMiddleware
extends Object
implements RouteHandler
    CorsMiddleware

    This is a simple CORS policy, you can also implement the handle(com.blade.mvc.RouteContext) method of the class to perform custom filtering.

    作者:
    biezhi
